function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 pandemic with over 107 million infections and 2.4 million deaths worldwide.","Impact":"Serious social and economic consequences resulting from lockdown measures. Pressure for evaluation of contact restrictions and future political measures.","Mitigation":"Implementation of targeted and efficient future political measures. Development of effective herd immunity through vaccination.","Technologies":"Vaccination technology, contact tracing technology, and data analytics for evaluation.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and essential workers.","Owner":"Government authorities, healthcare organizations, and research institutions."},{"Description":"Socio-economic and region-specific factors associated with the spread of COVID-19 at an ecological level.","Impact":"Lack of understanding of factors influencing the spread of COVID-19, leading to ineffective policies and measures.","Mitigation":"Conducting empirical evaluation of prevailing contact restrictions and development of region-specific interventions based on socio-economic factors.","Technologies":"Data analytics and geographical information systems for identifying regional patterns of spread.","People":"Policy makers, researchers, and public health officials.","Owner":"Government authorities, research institutions, and public health organizations."}]}
